summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Denny Way, from 32nd Avenue North to 37th Avenue North et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 18176, creating Local Improvement District No. 1710 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
